thread.title: Great room, comfy bed and a good nights sleep guaranteed
thread.title_full: Great room, comfy bed and a good nights sleep guaranteed - Review of Premier Inn London Brixton Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Eirik S
title: Great room, comfy bed and a good nights sleep guaranteed
text: Did not know what to expect when booking with Premier Inn, but we were all pleasantly surprised. The location was good, the beds better and the quality of sleep even better. At the price they offer, i highly recommend this.
